mapper.select: select * from goodsReply where g_no=#{g_no} order by gr_no,gr_level
mapper.insert: insert into goodsReply(gr_no, g_no, m_id, gr_content,gr_ref,gr_level,gr_step) values(seq_goodsreply.nextval, #{g_no}, #{m_id}, #{gr_content},#{gr_ref},#{gr_level},#{gr_step})
mapper.update: update goodsReply set gr_content = #{gr_content} where gr_no = #{gr_no}
update goodsReply set gr_step=gr_step+1 where gr_no=#{gr_no}
